subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: After goalie Martin Biron gave up nine goals in two games during the team’s recent road trip, he was given two choices: report to Hartford of the American Hockey League (or whichever N.H.L. team claims him) or retire.
snippet: After goalie Martin Biron gave up nine goals in two games during the team’s recent road trip, he was given two choices: report to Hartford of the American Hockey League (or whichever N.H.L. team claims him) or retire.
